$schema.title: JSON Schema
$schema.description: Reference to JSON schema of this config

qwc_config_schema.description: The name of the DB schema which stores the qwc config. Default: qwc_config

auth_service_url.description: URL to auth service, used for login redirects. Default: `/auth/`

totp_enabled.description: Show TOTP fields for two factor authentication

proxy_url_whitelist.description: List of RegExes for whitelisted URLs

proxy_timeout.description: Timeout in seconds for proxy requests

admin_gui_title.description: Title displayed in Admin Gui home page

admin_gui_subtitle.description: Subtitle displayed in Admin Gui home page

solr_service_url.description: Solr Service base URL for collection

solr_tenant_dih_config_file.description: Path to source DataImportHandler config file for tenant

solr_update_check_wait.description: Wait time in seconds for checks during Solr index update

solr_update_check_max_retries.description: Max number of retries for checks during Solr index update

input_config_path.description: The path to the input configs. Required for 'themes' and 'config_editor' plugin.

qwc2_path.description: The path to QWC2 files. Required for 'themes' and 'alkis' plugins.

qgs_resources_path.description: The path to the QGIS projects. Required for 'themes' plugin.

info_templates_path.description: The path to the html info templates. Required for 'themes' plugin.

ows_prefix.description: The OGC service URL path prefix, i.e. /ows. Required for 'themes' plugin.

qgis_project_extension.description: The QGIS project file extension to look for. Default: '.qgs'

default_qgis_server_url.description: The default Qgis server URL. Required for 'themes' plugin.

application_name.description: The application name to display in the invite emails. Default: 'QWC'

application_url.description: The application URL to display in the invite emails. Default: computed from the Admin GUI URL'

resource_blacklist.description: List of resource types to blacklist.
